content.question: Paragraph 1 ("He is ... noble action") contrasts

choices.label: the acquisition of skills and the possession of aptitude
the labor of reasoning and the exhilaration of acting
the dissemination of knowledge and the cultivation of intellectual and moral powers
the traits of practical students and those of creative thinkers

content.answer: the dissemination of knowledge and the cultivation of intellectual and moral powers

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
